tweet.text: After a failed Aug. 21, 1991 coup attempt, Pres. Bush expressed his happiness that Gorbachev was unharmed. The two leaders then discussed the situation in Moscow: https://t.co/a1yA4BKkBI https://t.co/rC6NXNjMU3
